short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Virtual Assistant can do a lot of tasks like: actual weather, information searching in the web and many other things...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VirtualAssistant is a multitool cramped into an extension. You have acces to world news, your local weather condition, wikipedia articles, a calculator and a lot of other cool stuff. There's even a little chatbot. All in all, VirtualAssistent is a very fast and easy way to get the information you want.
